text:
December 26. 1956
Station WHA-TV, Madison, Wis,
Miss Gertrude Broderick
Office of Education
U. S. Dept, of HeaUi, Education and Welfare
Washington 25, D. C.
Dear Gertrude:
I have Just learned of your election as Director*at-Large
and I want to extend my congratulations and welcome you back to
the NAEB Board of Directors,
I am well aware that there are many problems ahead for
ray administration and it is comforting to realise that there
are dependable and experienced people such as yourself to help
me shoulder the responsibilities, I look forward to working
with you again in the interests of NAEB,
My very best wishes for the holiday season.
Cordially yours.
William G. Harley
WGH; jc
